basic.description: An in-depth analysis of the genetics, biochemistry, assembly and function of the major structures of the procaryotic cell. Emphasis on the experimental approaches in the current literature.
basic.subject: MICR
basic.title: Advanced Procaryotic Structure and Function

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    BIOL 205/3.0 and (MICR 221/3.0 or MICR 229/3.0 with a minimum grade of B-) and (Level 3 or above and reg in the LISC Major or Spec. Plan) and (a GPA of 2.5).
COREQUISITE    BCHM 310/6.0 or BCHM 315/3.0 or BIOL 334/3.0.
